name: org.openrewrite.maven.AddDependency
description: Adds a dependency to the pom.xml unconditionally. Use this when a transitive dependency is removed or a new library is needed. Do NOT use onlyIfUsing parameter. IMPORTANT: Use exact version strings from Maven Central.

name: org.openrewrite.maven.UpgradeDependency
description: Upgrades the version of a dependency in the pom.xml. Use this when you need to change a dependency to a newer version.

name: org.openrewrite.maven.RemoveDependency
description: Removes a dependency from the pom.xml. Use this when a dependency is no longer needed or causes conflicts.

name: org.openrewrite.maven.ChangeDependencyGroupIdAndArtifactId
description: Changes the groupId and/or artifactId of a dependency. Use when a library has been renamed or relocated (e.g., mysql:mysql-connector-java to com.mysql:mysql-connector-j).

name: org.openrewrite.maven.AddPlugin
description: Adds a Maven plugin to the pom.xml. Use when a plugin is required for the build process.

name: org.openrewrite.maven.ChangePropertyValue
description: Changes the value of a Maven property in pom.xml. Use when you need to update version properties or other configuration values.

name: org.openrewrite.maven.AddProperty
description: Adds a new property to the pom.xml properties section.

name: org.openrewrite.java.ChangeType
description: Changes the fully qualified name of a class (package or class name). Use this when a class moves packages (e.g., javax to jakarta). NOTE: Requires compilable code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.ChangePackage
description: Changes the package of Java classes. Use when an entire package has been renamed (e.g., javax.annotation to jakarta.annotation). NOTE: Requires compilable code.

name: org.openrewrite.java.ChangeMethodName
description: Renames a method. Use this when a library deprecates a method name in favor of a new one. NOTE: Requires compilable code.
